    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030613</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030613</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La Tierra y la energía solar</string>
            <string language="en">The earth and solar energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Masse und die Solarenergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La terre et l'énergie solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A terra e a energia solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La terra e l'energia solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γη και η ηλιακή ενέργεια</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Describe la cantidad de energía que reciben las zonas del planeta, debido a su esfericidad, a estar envuelta por la Atmósfera y a la inclinación de su eje de giro.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic describing the quantity of energy received by zones on the planet, due to its sphericity, to it being surrounded by the atmosphere and to the inclination of its rotational axis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Tierra</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">energía solar</string>
            <string language="en">solar energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die Quantität von Energie 
empfangen durch Zonen auf dem Planeten, wegen seiner Kugelgestalt, zu 
ihr umgebend durch die Atmosphäre und zur Neigung seiner 
Rotationsmittellinie beschreibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet décrivant la quantité d'énergie reçue 
par des zones sur la planète, due à sa sphéricité, d'elle entouré
par l'atmosphère et de la inclination de son axe de rotation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que descreve a quantidade da energia 
recebida por zonas no planeta,  devido a seu sphericity, a ele sendo 
cercado pela atmosfera e à inclinação de sua linha central 
rotatória.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che descrive la quantità di energia 
ricevuta dalle zone sul pianeta, dovuto la relativa sfericità, ad 
esso che è circondato dall'atmosfera ed all'inclinazione del relativo
asse di rotazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που περιγράφει την ποσότητα ενέργειας που 
παραλαμβάνεται από τις ζώνες στον πλανήτη, λόγω sphericity 
του, σε του που περιβάλλεται από την ατμόσφαιρα και στην κλίση του
περιστροφικού άξονά του.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie solaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia solare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλιακή ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
